Package com.dhemery.os

Run operating system commands.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OSCommand
    Represents command to run on the operating system.
    OSCommandBuilder<T extends OSCommand>
    Builds an OSCommand to be executed by the operating system.
    OSCommandFactory<T extends OSCommand>
    A factory that creates OSCommands.
    OSProcess
    Represents an operating system process.
    RunnableCommand
    A command that can be run.
    Shell
    A shell that provides an environment in which to run OS commands.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FactoryBasedCommandBuilder
    A command builder that uses a factory to construct the commands.
    FactoryBasedShell
    A shell that obtains commands via a factory.
    PublishingCommand
    Wraps a command and publishes events when it runs.
    PublishingCommandFactory
    A command factory that wraps another factory's OSCommands in PublishingCommand wrappers.
    PublishingProcess
    Wraps an OSProcess and publishes events about its output.
    RuntimeCommand
    A runnable command launched via a Java ProcessBuilder.
    RuntimeCommandFactory
    A factory that produces RunnableCommands.
    RuntimeProcess
    A wrapper that adds an RuntimeProcess.output() method to a Java process launched by an OSCommand.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OSCommandException
    Reports a problem that occurred while running an OS command.

Package com.dhemery.os Description

Run operating system commands.
